chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product is iPhone 12 and it has the above problem: 
When unpacking the iPhone, I noticed a slight damage to the casing (top left) . 
I ordered in 'very good' condition and paid for it. If there's a price adjustment according to the condition 'good', I'll keep the iPhone. Otherwise, please ask for return.
Best regards
Silvia Nehring 
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We have carried out a commercial gesture of 60 € on your behalf to the customer. Indeed, according to our quality charter, the customer is entitled to this type of compensation because the Condition is not as ordered.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best Regards,
Ermelinda of Back Market
